data.prayer: Lord, there are 13,031 people in the state of Escaldes-Engordany who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Escaldes-Engordany, Andorra
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 197 believers in Escaldes-Engordany, Andorra a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Escaldes-Engordany, Andorra to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 14,600 people living in Escaldes-Engordany.
the state of Escaldes-Engordany has (about) 197 people who know Jesus, 13,031 people who know about him culturally, and 1,372 people who are far from Jesus.
Over 9.39 percent of the people of Escaldes-Engordany are far from Jesus.
Spirit, teach the 197 believers in Escaldes-Engordany that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Escaldes-Engordany, Andorra has a population of 14,600.

We estimate Escaldes-Engordany has 197 people who might know Jesus, 13,031 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,372 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 74 neighbors who need Jesus.
